description:
T1. Sycamore	
Car Park/Tree Adjacent Parking Space 14b:
Reduce back overhanging branches to parking space 14b by 2.5m to suitable growth points.
The tree's current height is 16m and crown spread is 9m
After the proposed works, the tree's height is 16m and the crown spread is 6.5m (Northeast flank of crown only)

T2. Sycamore	Car Park/Tree Adjacent Parking Space 14b:
Reduce back all overhanging branches to the parking space, Flat 3 by 2.5m to suitable growth points.
Remove all trunk growth.
Remove dead branches and dangerous hanging branches.
The tree's current height is 16m and crown spread is 9m
After the proposed works, the tree's height is 16m and the crown spread is 6.5m (Southeast flank of crown only)

T4	Holm Oak	Car Park/Tree Adjacent Parking Space 14b:
Reduce height by 2.5m
Reduce back all overhanging branches to the parking space 17 by 1.5m to suitable growth points.
The tree's current height is 12m and crown spread is 5m
After the proposed works, the tree's height is 16m and the crown spread is 3.5m (Southeast flank of crown only).
